Elon Musk - As the CEO of SpaceX and Tesla, Elon Musk is at the forefront of innovation and technological advancements. Swapping places with him would give me unparalleled access to the latest developments in electric cars, space exploration, and renewable energy. I could learn from his visionary leadership style and gain insights into the future of transportation and energy.

Greta Thunberg - As a climate activist, Greta Thunberg has become a global leader in the fight against climate change. Swapping places with her would allow me to understand the urgency and impact of climate change on a personal level. I could learn from her passion and determination to hold world leaders accountable for their actions, and gain insights into the grassroots movements that are driving change.

Lin-Manuel Miranda - As a renowned playwright and composer, Lin-Manuel Miranda has used his art to inspire social change. Swapping places with him would give me the opportunity to learn from his creative process and gain insights into how art can be used to address social issues. I could also benefit from his expertise in storytelling and use my own creativity to make a positive impact on the world.

Malala Yousafzai - As a Nobel Peace Prize laureate and education activist, Malala Yousafzai has dedicated her life to fighting for girls' education. Swapping places with her would allow me to understand the challenges and triumphs of her journey, and gain insights into the power of education to transform lives. I could also learn from her courage and resilience in the face of adversity.

David Attenborough - As a renowned naturalist and broadcaster, David Attenborough has dedicated his life to raising awareness about the natural world and the importance of conservation. Swapping places with him would give me the opportunity to learn from his vast knowledge of the natural world and gain insights into the impact of human activity on the environment. I could also benefit from his expertise in communicating complex scientific concepts to a broad audience.
